name: Mushu
description: Medium sized male with long-floppy ears and a brownish-gray coat. Friendly with all and loves to munch and crunch on any and everything. Needs an energetic owner.

name: Simba
description: Small-sized male with ocean blue eyes and a light-brown coat. Indepdent rabbit that likes to manipulate his care takers into serving his every need. Needs a gullible owner.

name: MoonMoon
description: Medium sized female with a white coat with rich brown eyes and three black spots on her back. Loves endless cuddles, pats, and kisses. Needs a patient, loving owner.

name: Meeshu
description: Small-sized female with smoked out black eyeliner around the eyes and a pure-white coat. Filled with anxiety and runs away from slight movement. Needs an anxious owner to match.

name: Steven
description: Large-sized male with long ears and a shiny black coat. Stomps at all times due to a constant need for attention and to assert dominance. Needs an owner that will be able to train him well.

name: SRK
description: Medium-sized male with small ears and a dark-brown coat. Fun, warm personality that is humorous and sweet. Needs playful owner.
